wildcard_match?(other)

[Source]

    # File lib/rr/wildcard_matchers/duck_type.rb, line 10
10:       def wildcard_match?(other)
11:         return true if self == other
12:         required_methods.each do |m|
13:           return false unless other.respond_to?(m)
14:         end
15:         return true
16:       end
